oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Zion M.B. Church: application for National Register recognition
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: The Lincoln County Historical Society
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 305 West Maple Street, Fayetteville, Lincoln Co., TN
Application for National Register recognition description of property and property use.
Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church was built in 1873 as the second African American church in Fayetteville.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
